profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.3.2 Annotation dictionaries - F key
profile.description: Except for annotation dictionaries whose Subtype value is Popup, all annotation dictionaries shall contain the F key.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Except for annotation dictionaries whose Subtype value is Popup, all annotation dictionaries shall contain the F key.

error.message: A dictionary of a non-Popup annotation does not contain F key
